mapper.select: select r.* from role r left join user_group_role_re re on re.role_id = r.id left join user_group_re ug on ug.group_id = re.group_id where ug.user_id = #{userId}

select r.* from role r left join role_permission_re rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join permission per on per.id = rp.permission_id and per.type = 3 left join permission_operation_re pm on pm.permission_id = per.id where pm.operation_id = #{operationId}
